xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="j6ui9I~2%~z8u:waCbrj" x="-62" y="-12">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="(JY@(zH)!NKW7y_5*1!@">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_document_keycode" id="hzFSD:=o-[_!k71lVQKD">
            <field name="event_">keyDownCode</field>
            <field name="keycode_">65</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="BW.=alnLn:,EKkk}P];z">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="~%yJW|+gdd0X~)HLGpu2">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="r(?bTnJd@%TY`uN,xW*(">
                    <field name="TEXT">Dio Brando</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="=22IN@IF-9bZ}O*xLZ2I">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="C``pf_Bb!*)oJ(*xhWlN">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="M6Zg|lQyw#N.x`=yPle_">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id="SX]^+DbbN5[zf:Y=j7j;"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="ZBU-g}+grN26mR,q[Nev">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#ff0000</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="7]_9zwdas~-ed4l89v~c">
                        <field name="music_">m4</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_document_keycode" id="[dP6a|M_Hp^(s;^rgrA^">
                    <field name="event_">keyDownCode</field>
                    <field name="keycode_">66</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="M/_46YTHPi2-Ax1DI28z"></block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="5gf1]_Po(wQ;4RC7Ca+3">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="s#,=|ql)p%GWf{RMtH{q">
                            <field name="NUM">2</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="mpu9250_detected_type" id="9*?BmmGcMqGK^[hqVvQ{" x="687" y="88">

  <block type="sheet_init" id="/+F]I!it@#)%Mi=8-Vdd" x="287" y="463">
    <value name="sheetUrl">
      <block type="text" id="8qbcHVFbb`U(#)%eXzkk">
        <field name="TEXT">https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17JVwBmXoEkzsdRAtdJWvrNWWiLBM1YYuKrxM-iVa45U/edit#gid=0</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="sheetName">
      <block type="text" id="sutwcQE8@_A3RQ4N5Sy(">
        <field name="TEXT">工作表1</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext_can_stop" id="e_nwvYT.AYZB~-5MR{+/">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <value name="times_">
          <block type="math_number" id="^y=C{oCxRooqF#R|#!aB">
            <field name="NUM">10</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="get_weather" id="ZFHxWb3{fe_Gxmy71]wd">
            <field name="type_">aqi</field>
            <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">取得氣象資料之後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
            <next>
              <block type="sheet_write_easy" id=")s?r0Q81+u/K2Wz;Vza:">
                <mutation items="4"></mutation>
                <field name="type">last</field>
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">試算表寫入資料之後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="data_0">
                  <block type="getdate" id="Gb6ys@MmEAs~5ZR6zGcQ">
                    <field name="date_">ymd</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="data_1">
                  <block type="gettime" id="}yjU8`iJOj5f9du9NuO*">
                    <field name="time_">hms</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="data_2">
                  <block type="bit_temp_val" id="7b9Te/DsUm7KE1I85msD"></block>
                </value>
                <value name="data_3">
                  <block type="get_weather_aqi" id="[4a8Yr1DSRhfXmjhBw^:">
                    <field name="location">新店</field>
                    <field name="type">PM25</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="controls_if" id="74ZaKBEM+-=mjzwAn=n;">
                    <value name="IF0">
                      <block type="logic_compare" id="7_p%?_+.4pXAff4P}g+J">
                        <field name="OP">GT</field>
                        <value name="A">
                          <block type="bit_temp_val" id="TWi0SH21+QAQ_hJcCF(U"></block>
                        </value>
                        <value name="B">
                          <block type="math_number" id="(LFKK#sI6ZvUa8gK%1|O">
                            <field name="NUM">20</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <statement name="DO0">
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="}ilF~[pf|`L@2cN8zsSJ">
                        <field name="music_">m4</field>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="Ey*LWl9P-O}wO[q8,7*2">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="+GUkig/tWyM;r6(ZwG5[">
                            <field name="NUM">1</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
